channel.title: Comments on: Book Review: The Road Map to Shodan, Volume 2

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I am planning to review Volume One. Will let you know when it's up!
item.content:encoded: I am planning to review Volume One. Will let you know when it’s up!

item.title: By: Til
item.dc:creator: Til
item.description: Nice review. I was actually hoping for you to do one, but I missed it since it doesn't show up in your book list. From what you wrote, this book seems to fit my strength quite perfectly, but it's not as if I didn't have a lot of unread go books on my shelf already. I do hope nevertheless that you get around to review the rest of the series eventually. tl;dr: Thanks. =)
item.content:encoded:
Nice review. I was actually hoping for you to do one, but I missed it since it doesn’t show up in your book list. From what you wrote, this book seems to fit my strength quite perfectly, but it’s not as if I didn’t have a lot of unread go books on my shelf already. I do hope nevertheless that you get around to review the rest of the series eventually.
tl;dr: Thanks. =)

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: You're welcome! I hope you enjoy it. Let me know what you think after you read it!
item.content:encoded: You’re welcome! I hope you enjoy it. Let me know what you think after you read it!

item.title: By: Matthew Porreca
item.dc:creator: Matthew Porreca
item.description: Thanks for the review! I look forward to checking out this series, it sounds like it is ideal for my strength and what I need to study.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the review! I look forward to checking out this series, it sounds like it is ideal for my strength and what I need to study.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I'm glad that you found it helpful! Looking forward to seeing how you apply it in our next game!
item.content:encoded: I’m glad that you found it helpful! Looking forward to seeing how you apply it in our next game!

item.title: By: Daurak
item.dc:creator: Daurak
item.description: I actually just bought this book and read it in two days. It was an excellent and simple read, creating a stronger foundation in concepts I knew, and introducing some new ones. I highly recomend it. I played a game in person the day after (today) I finished it, and could tell I used a lot of things from it, and without it wouldn't have done as well.
item.content:encoded:
I actually just bought this book and read it in two days. It was an excellent and simple read, creating a stronger foundation in concepts I knew, and introducing some new ones. I highly recomend it.
I played a game in person the day after (today) I finished it, and could tell I used a lot of things from it, and without it wouldn’t have done as well.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks Robbie! In terms of tesuji books, I'll be honest in that I haven't found one that I quite perfectly love for someone just starting out with tesuji. The most enjoyable one I've read to date is "Get Strong at Tesuji," but it can be a bit advanced at times which is why it's not my go to book for players around 10k. I don't believe the fourth book of the series has been published yet, but I will be sure to post a review on it the moment it is printed and I can get my hands on it. Looking forward to seeing you this Saturday!
item.content:encoded:
Thanks Robbie! In terms of tesuji books, I’ll be honest in that I haven’t found one that I quite perfectly love for someone just starting out with tesuji. The most enjoyable one I’ve read to date is “Get Strong at Tesuji,” but it can be a bit advanced at times which is why it’s not my go to book for players around 10k.
I don’t believe the fourth book of the series has been published yet, but I will be sure to post a review on it the moment it is printed and I can get my hands on it. Looking forward to seeing you this Saturday!

item.title: By: Machinato
item.dc:creator: Machinato
item.description: Superb review, Ben. Thanks so much for the effort. It is now being ordered at my house! I would have never ordered this book without this review. Have you reviewed any good Tesuji books that presents things clearly and basically as well? Maybe the fourth one of the series?
item.content:encoded: Superb review, Ben. Thanks so much for the effort. It is now being ordered at my house! I would have never ordered this book without this review. Have you reviewed any good Tesuji books that presents things clearly and basically as well? Maybe the fourth one of the series?

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Glad you enjoyed the review! I definitely think this book does a great job by approaching topics from a simpler perspective. Be sure to let me know what you think when you get it!
item.content:encoded: Glad you enjoyed the review! I definitely think this book does a great job by approaching topics from a simpler perspective. Be sure to let me know what you think when you get it!
